name: SlapFlashCamera
tagline: A disposable camera app for iOS
body:
### Making an app
This is a simple camera app for the iPhone, with some fun features reminiscent of the disposable cameras that were popular in the 1990's.

Check out the design here: [SlapFlashCamera design](http://bit.ly/slapflashcameradesign)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
